features: Silicone Sink Cover: Transform your small bathroom, RV, camper, or travel space with the Johamoo Sink Cover. This space-saving accessory are effectively extending your countertop to accommodate a range of makeup brushes, cleaning tools, and other essentials, turning your sink into a multifunctional space.

Powerful Core: Small Bathroom Must Haves Accessories with the steel frame in the middle as the core in the middle, providing strong support and stable structure, with strong load-bearing capacity without worrying about deformation or sagging in the middle. Size is 19.6 * 15.35 inch. (Tips: Please confirm that the size of the sink mat is suitable for your sink)

High Quality: Crafted from high-quality silicone, this sink cover heat resistant up to 450 degrees Fahrenheit, safely place hot styling tools such as curling irons, hairdryers, or straighteners on its surface. And it with raised particle on the surface, convenient for you to clean your makeup brush.

DIY Customization for Functionality: Take control of your space with the DIY-friendly design of this sink cover. Easily cut and customize the cover to create designated areas for a water faucet and storage for makeup accessories. Personalize your setup to meet your unique needs.

Easy to Carry and Storage: It is easily rolled up and stored conveniently. You can choose to hang them up or take them for travel. Its compact design ensures you can carry it with ease, stay on-trend with this innovative solution for optimizing your space, whether at home or on the move.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This little product is great for someone who has a small bathroom and little space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Best Sink Cover
reviews.reviewText: I love how easy this is to store. Very durable , easy to clean. Works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Makes my life easier
reviews.reviewText: I usually get crazy stressed and frustrated getting ready to leave the house. I do my hair and make up in my bathroom and at my vanity. Umm ADHD, so I'm constantly back and forth a hundred times. But I'm always dropping my straightener in the sink it my makeup brushes, then they end up getting wet because sink always is wet when I don't want it to be. This allows me to spread all my stuff out and not worry about it. Easy to clean as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not as sturdy as I thought
reviews.reviewText: But it’s definitely fine. I wanted it to free up counter space and use daily for putting stuff on top. And it’s definitely not sturdy like that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The Bathroom Sink Cover is a clever and practical accessory that transforms your sink into a versatile countertop space. Whether you need extra room for toiletries, makeup, or other personal items, this cover provides a flat and stable surface over your sink. The cover is made from durable materials, making it water-resistant and easy to clean. It's a convenient solution for maximizing space in smaller bathrooms or creating a dedicated grooming area. The sleek design often complements various bathroom styles, adding both functionality and aesthetic appeal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Seriously…where have I been w/ out this thing!?I know it sounds ridiculous but I literally have zero counter space.This has significantly changed the utilization space by 💯.Not excellent for heavy objects but for lighter weight things like makeup, MU brushes, and the like.Folds up for easy storage when not in use.Luv It‼️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Useful and Unique Product
reviews.reviewText: My wife often has needed more room on the bathroom counter. I have seen her struggle many times with finding a place for the blow dryer, curling iron, makeup mirrors etc. In steps this product providing a place to set all the extras. It is made of a heavy silicone material that rolls out and rolls back up very easily. You might think it's placement over the sink would be an inconvenience with regards to accessing the sinks primary function. Not so; the product is designed so you can easily pick it up and move it out of the way with your extras still upon it.It's important for me to mention this actually fits over 1/2 of our standard kitchen sink way better than it fits over the sink in the bathroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Extends our RV counter space
reviews.reviewText: We don't use the sink often, so instead of removing it here we have a cover that makes it more useful to us!Very exciting. Now we can effectively double that area. Sturdy enough to use as a prep area or put our smaller things like bag of bread/fruit/etc.Even a gallon of milk isn't too heavy.Rolls up into a storable item, fits in with the pots and pans or towels.Materials are kitchen-esque, happy enough with everything.
